error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_UNRECOVERABLE
error-code.message: native storage engine unrecoverable error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_INITIALIZATION
error-code.message: native storage engine failed to initialize

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_WRITE_FLOW_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: failure in data write flow

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_READ_FLOW_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: failure in data read flow

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_UNKNOWN_TYPE
error-code.message: native storage engine: unknown type in switch

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_ALLOC_FAILED
error-code.message: native storage engine: failed to allocate memory

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_PARAMS
error-code.message: native storage engine: illegal parameters passed to method

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_STATE
error-code.message: native storage engine: illegal state reached

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_HA_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: max submissions reached error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_CACHE_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: cache error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_IO_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: error in io path

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_CFG_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: error in storage layer config

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_NO_RESOURCES
error-code.message: native storage engine: lack of resources

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: aborted tx called allocate or free storage page

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_LUCENE_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: lucene match error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_INLINE_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: inline error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_BLOOM_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: bloom error

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_TEMPORARY_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: temporary error in storage layer

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_PERMANENT_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: permanent error in storage layer

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_TIMEOUT_ERROR
error-code.message: native storage engine: timeout in storage layer

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_STORAGE_READ_OUT_OF_BOUNDS
error-code.message: native storage engine: read out of bounds

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_ALWAYS_THROW
error-code.message: native storage engine: always throw min code, should not be used directly

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_OUT_OF_SPACE
error-code.message: native storage engine: out of disk space

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_LUCENE_FILE_TOO_BIG
error-code.message: native storage engine: lucene file is too big

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_WARM_FILE_TOO_MANY_ROWS
error-code.message: native storage engine: warm file has too many rows

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_FAILED_TO_INIT_LIBAIO
error-code.message: native storage engine: aio_max_nr was not set properly

error-code.name: ENV_EXCEPTION_DISK_ACCESS_PERMISSONS
error-code.message: native storage engine: failed in file system operation (open/close/etc) probably due to disk access permissions
